# **omi**

[Permalink: omi](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi#omi)

Meet Omi, the worldâ€™s leading open-source AI wearable that captures conversations, gives summaries, action items and does actions for you. Simply connect Omi to your mobile device and enjoy automatic, high-quality
transcriptions of meetings, chats, and voice memos wherever you are.

[![Omi](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/4256921/402814578-834d3fdb-31b5-4f22-ae35-da3d2b9a8f59.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..8lJnXxCW9M1oK7dmpWmALX5GuPq4Kg5rVp6mHW8Y9CI)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/4256921/402814578-834d3fdb-31b5-4f22-ae35-da3d2b9a8f59.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..8lJnXxCW9M1oK7dmpWmALX5GuPq4Kg5rVp6mHW8Y9CI)[![Image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/492112562-fdad4226-e5ce-4c55-b547-9101edfa3203.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..7sAp2ByL_dWQ7E6R7VJvrWoJ9qAEW0STNvq5N-DBoSA)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/492112562-fdad4226-e5ce-4c55-b547-9101edfa3203.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..7sAp2ByL_dWQ7E6R7VJvrWoJ9qAEW0STNvq5N-DBoSA)

[![CleanShot 2025-02-08 at 18 22 23](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/411279995-7a658366-9e02-4057-bde5-a510e1f0217a.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kStG_JXvLLO6vBW_pCvjVi2ESsmpkw5v_SjGb3eUKHs)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/411279995-7a658366-9e02-4057-bde5-a510e1f0217a.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kStG_JXvLLO6vBW_pCvjVi2ESsmpkw5v_SjGb3eUKHs)

### [Site](https://omi.me/) \| [Download](https://omi.me/download) \| [Docs](https://docs.omi.me/) \| [Buy omi Dev Kit](https://www.omi.me/products/omi-dev-kit-2) \| [Buy Omi Glass Dev Kit](https://www.omi.me/glass)

## ðŸš€ Quick Start for Developers (2 min)

[Permalink: ðŸš€ Quick Start for Developers (2 min)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi#-quick-start-for-developers-2-min)

Get the omi app running locally:

```
git clone https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi.git
cd omi/app

bash setup.sh ios     # android, macos
```

## Create your own App (1 min)

[Permalink: Create your own App (1 min)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi#create-your-own-app-1-min)

Download omi App

[![Get it on Google Play](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/cf167235ef2ee6764e09f27330d31e7076ad80b4aae3dfa8902a7ed4b95c65e4/68747470733a2f2f75706c6f61642e77696b696d656469612e6f72672f77696b6970656469612f636f6d6d6f6e732f372f37382f476f6f676c655f506c61795f53746f72655f62616467655f454e2e737667)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.friend.ios)[![Download on the App Store](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/259c48a2ee0a9cda65bc80f532c853186a4d87e9b0505e052c0b7ca2c1911825/68747470733a2f2f75706c6f61642e77696b696d656469612e6f72672f77696b6970656469612f636f6d6d6f6e732f332f33632f446f776e6c6f61645f6f6e5f7468655f4170705f53746f72655f42616467652e737667)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/friend-ai-wearable/id6502156163)[![Download MacOS app](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/503170828-59c47ec7-3da0-47d7-be2f-7467e4189499.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._YvefReJUzqKPPt6kPEbUlotb2tQjFN7chI8-j6CyKs)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/omi-ai-smart-meeting-notes/id6502156163)

Create webhook using [webhook.site](https://webhook.site/) and copy this url

[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425263468-083a6ec4-4694-4c7a-843a-4a1a0c254453.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..NXSWWYf5OWfhr8Q5sACyq2FQmsXgnm8x_DOCGZLv45U)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425263468-083a6ec4-4694-4c7a-843a-4a1a0c254453.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..NXSWWYf5OWfhr8Q5sACyq2FQmsXgnm8x_DOCGZLv45U)

In omi App:

| Explore => Create an App | Select Capability | Paste Webhook URL | Install App |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425262667-31809b81-7de2-4381-b5fc-5c9714972211.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..rcZsmONE2G4YlqNYNPORM4jXYzlZoqu980VrHJhPzjs)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425262667-31809b81-7de2-4381-b5fc-5c9714972211.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..rcZsmONE2G4YlqNYNPORM4jXYzlZoqu980VrHJhPzjs) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425268337-59cfbe8e-7e3b-437f-81f7-25eb50ccdd7d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..DFE9nIy1x8Z0vgXbHcdZEdfh8onfGlg92oy17Y6Q5MA)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425268337-59cfbe8e-7e3b-437f-81f7-25eb50ccdd7d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..DFE9nIy1x8Z0vgXbHcdZEdfh8onfGlg92oy17Y6Q5MA) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425267454-3d864ee8-555f-4ded-b4db-87ff78128323.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Z30Hysfpgo1A-aZzyMSp3HdDH-Y4WGMUMinJnmmOumI)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425267454-3d864ee8-555f-4ded-b4db-87ff78128323.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Z30Hysfpgo1A-aZzyMSp3HdDH-Y4WGMUMinJnmmOumI) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425269783-58cf6da6-e245-415e-92e7-dc1f46583cfc.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..nloLG_rBPNhPlQcl4hLwkgztBAuoxz68KhVstZd8_T0)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425269783-58cf6da6-e245-415e-92e7-dc1f46583cfc.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..nloLG_rBPNhPlQcl4hLwkgztBAuoxz68KhVstZd8_T0) |

Start speaking, you'll see Real-time transcript on [webhook.site](https://webhook.site/).

## In this repo:

[Permalink: In this repo:](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi#in-this-repo)

- [omi device](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/omi) \- nRF chips, zephyr, c/c++
- [omi glass](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/omiglass) esp32-s3, c/c++
- [omi app](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/app) \- flutter
- [omi backend](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/backend) \- python, fastapi, firebase, pinecone, redis, deepgram, speechmatic, soniox, openai-compatible apis, langchain, silero vad
- [SDKs](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/sdks) \- react native, swift, python
- [ai personas (web)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/web/personas-open-source) \- nextjs
